m_szDocTitle: Op-Ed: The Elio Motors 3-wheeler Won't Sell | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Has Elio done any marching? Last I heard they were trying to find more money. Contrarian Well, look how things have changed for Elio now in October 2015.. seems like our young writer of this article may have spoke too soon… Bob_Wallace How have they changed?  I looked online and  all I see is that they’ve made another prototype are now trying to get crowdfunding because they haven’t been able get funded through normal channels. “, the company is waiting on funding to enter production. Paul Elio, founder and CEO of Elio Motors, said the company needs about $300 million before they can start pro
